roleset.name: to view or exhibit in advance

example.name: transitive
example.text: Robert Guy , an associate curator at the Princeton Art Museum , was previewing a June antiquities sale at the auction house when he recognized the kylix , which he , as a specialist in Attic pottery and a careful reader of the Stolen Art Alert in `` IFAR Reports , '' knew was stolen .

propbank.arg: Robert Guy , an associate curator at the Princeton Art Museum
a June antiquities sale at the auction house
when he recognized the kylix , which he , as a specialist in Attic pottery and a careful reader of the Stolen Art Alert in `` IFAR Reports , '' knew was stolen

roleset.note: PREVIEW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'preview' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from preview.01-v predicate notes)
